All Classes at Level 4

Lucky Tips & Notes

What's great about this feat is that it's handled like a reaction (but does not cost a reaction). You don't have to anticipate missing; you can use it only if you miss an attack, fail a check, or a saving throw, or if an enemy is about to hit you.
